H0.text: The Great Sphinx of Giza in Egypt is a statue of a reclining mythical creature with a lion's body and the head of a what. Eagle

H1.text: The Great Sphinx of Giza in Egypt is a statue of a reclining mythical creature with a lion's body and the head of a what. Jackal

H2.text: The Great Sphinx of Giza in Egypt is a statue of a reclining mythical creature with a lion's body and the head of a what. Falcon

H3.text: The Great Sphinx of Giza in Egypt is a statue of a reclining mythical creature with a lion's body and the head of a what. Human

A4.text: The Great Sphinx of Giza is a limestone statue of a reclining sphinx, a mythical creature with the head of a human and the body of a lion.
